Text: Please leave a comment and press the +1 on quality control. Trying to become a trusted uploader as soon as possible!
thanks for upload. just to be 100% sixaxis will let me use my ps3 controller on any emulator right? i really want to use a ps3 controller on my psx emulator
running on htc evo 4g i did the compatibility check and it said it is compatible i just hope it works for the right emulator :)

@CHIEFps: Yes the Sixaxis works for the ps emulator, that is the main one i use it for. im not too sure if it will work on the Evo since the devs have been having compatibility problems with HTC devices.
